def_cn: 米尤扎克(商店或餐馆播放的背景音乐)
def_en: Muzak is recorded music that is played as background music in shops or restaurants.

def_cn: 让人提不起兴趣的音乐
def_en: If you describe music as muzak, you dislike it because you think it is dull or unnecessary.
